channel.title: Halp running source
channel.description:
Okay. Well I've given my source to someone else so he can host my server but i wanna make some changes to it.
Only thing is, I can't test it.
I have the files on my computer, I've edited them but when i press start server, it gives me this:
Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
Is there any way I can stop this from happening and play my source!?
I also need help making the ::getpass thing owner only.
Apparently EVERYONE can use it on LOTS of Silab servers. Even those who aren't mods.
EDIT: One last request. How do I change when the game autosaves?
Like how many mins between each save. What file and what line?
EDIT 2: OOPS! Another Request! How do I move the Jad to the Mage Arena? And how do I add Chaos Elementals there?
EDIT 3: AAANNNDDD, I want an emote tab which teles to x, x (Haven't figured out coords yet). How do I do this!?

item.title: Halp running source
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“krixus, post:5, topic:148138”]How do I find out…

And I know I’m not anyway.[/quote]http://hoskinator.blogspot.com/2006/08/finding-out-what-ports-are-being-used.html

Read full topic

Unable to start port 43594 already in use is cause your already running something on that port
